file_content.text: You killed those men. What kind of monster are you?
You're no mercenary. What are you doing here?
I should ask you the same.
I'm a warrior who saves lives. Momi and I are going to change the galaxy together.
Hey, those mercenaries shot at me first.
Monster? Me?
Sure, justify your slaughter. That's what your type always does.
I need that beast you stole from Drooga.
Give me the shanjaru.
You're too late, you barbaric scum.
The shanjaru is gone, and I'll never tell you where Momi took it. I'm ready to die for my cause. Are you?
If you won't listen to reason, listen to this.
Nobody's dying. [Punch her]
Urk!
Better than blasting her, I guess. Let's see what she's carrying.
This has all been a huge misunderstanding. I'm trying to help you.
I'm on your side.
Oh, no. Momi must have hired you to transport the shanjaru off Nar Shaddaa!
I'm so sorry about those mercenaries. You came to the wrong place. You're supposed to go to Lazhae's.
This datapad explains everything. Take this, too--it's the least I can do after all this. I, uh, I can't stay here....
Unbelievable. One of these days, you have to teach me how you do that.
Then die, already. [Kill her.]
Ahh!
Blast it, Captain! I hope nobody saw that....
Freedom for all life!
